message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $18000.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am only willing to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $16500.  This reflects the value of the product and allows for some room for negotiation.  Let's see if we can find common ground.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe $15000 is a fair price for this product. I would like to stick to this figure as it aligns with my budget constraints. I hope we can reach an agreement at this price.
